title: Rito.. You beauty!
body:
So... I was wanting to get Rumble to a point where I wanted to purchase some fine RP.
But to my astonishment this just happened - RITO RNG thanks!

http://i63.tinypic.com/2qx26c5.png[/IMG]

I love the champ shards!!

replies.body: I got rengar the other day too. Wanted him for ages just kept foolishly buying champ chards. They payed off! That's great though!
Nice! congrats and get ready to rumble in the jungle!

Champ shards, the best way to RNG champs you want, whilst still farming for essence to level up your favorite champ levels in the process :)

i got bilgewater rumble skin on standby for my Rumble, just chipping away at the shards hoping to get him, otherwise i may end up with too many mastery 7's and nothing to earn chests from that i may as well buy him in 3-4weeks if no luck, but im guessing i'll get around 15-25 shards to try by then. And if he comes on sale... well that's an option also :P
I got riven and teemo..... ive now got enough blue crystals for a decent champ
